data.name: BattlefieldCars
data.detailed_description:
BATTLEFIELD CARS



Have fun playing this arena style shooting game with cars with your friends or alone against ai 's trying to survive the battle.

Single Player

Kill as many rivals you can to collect xp and unlock new car models and new maps. Drift points will get you to the top of the drift rank. Earn score points and get to the maximum level you can. Pick up ammo , health , nitro and shield to help you survive the battle . If you loose you don’t get the what earned in the battlefield.

Spilt screen local multiplayer

A battle against other players trying to survive . 1 to 4 players game , choose the car model you want and you can optional pick a nick name . Win the game by picking up health , ammo , shield and nitro . Do whatever you can to stay the last one alive player in the game.

Note : in the local multiplayer game , the use of gamepads is highly recommended .You can’t play 2 players with keyboard and gamepad.

data.short_description: A shooting game with cars where you can play in split screen local multiplayer or in single player mode .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Wnidows10 , Windows 11
  • Processor: guad core CPU at 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB of Vram
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: The use of a GamePad is recommended for local multiplayer game .

Recommended:
